snippet: The United States military said Thursday that a coalition airstrike in Syria had killed a senior Islamic State leader who helped raise money, secure arms and transport fighters for the militant group.
abstract: Senior Islamic State leader Tariq bin Tahar al-Awni al-Harzi is killed in American airstrike in Syria.
lead_paragraph: The United States military said Thursday that a coalition airstrike in Syria had killed a senior Islamic State leader who helped raise money, secure arms and transport fighters for the militant group.

headline.main: Syria: Strike Kills an ISIS Leader
headline.print_headline: Syria: Strike Kills an ISIS Leader

keywords.name: organizations
